content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Juan, thank you for your interest in the apartment. Based on my calculations, I believe that the rental price should be around 1000 Euros per month. This price takes into account the size of the apartment, as well as the current market rates in Munich. Is this a price that you are comfortable with?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am not comfortable with this price. Can we negotiate?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Of course, I am open to negotiating the rental price. What is your proposed price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am interested in renting the apartment for 800 Euros per month.

I am a student, so I don't have a lot of money to spend on rent. I want to be on good terms with my landlord, so I am willing to pay a reasonable price.

Also, I am dependable and responsible, so I am confident that I will be able to make the payments on time.

I am also willing to sign a longer lease agreement if it means a lower rental price.

Please let me know if there is anything else I can do to make the negotiation more successful.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Thank you for your proposal, Juan. While I understand that you are a student and may have limited financial resources, I must inform you that my goal as a landlord is to maximize my gains. Based on my calculations, I believe that the rental price of 1000 Euros per month is a fair and reasonable rate for this apartment.

However, I am open to discussing a longer lease agreement if it means a lower rental price for you. In that case, I could consider a discount of around 100 Euros per month for a 12-month lease agreement, bringing the total rental price to 900 Euros per month.

If you are willing to sign a longer lease agreement and pay the discounted rental price, I would be happy to agree to the terms. Please let me know if you have any questions or if there is anything else I can do to assist you in the negotiation process.
name: Heinrich Heine
